Dear All,

 

The insurer has agreed to a settlement of AED 133,463.82, net to Traveller. The funds are expected to be released within 2-3 weeks, pending the resolution of an unrelated credit control matter, which should be addressed by the second week of October, the latest.

 

I will continue to monitor the situation closely and will expedite the payment process as soon as the issue is resolved.

 

Please don't hesitate to reach out if you have any questions or need further clarification.

 

Best regards,

Hagop

Dear All,

 

The insurer has agreed to a settlement of AED 133,463.82, net to Traveller. The funds are expected to be released within 2-3 weeks, pending the resolution of an unrelated credit control matter, which should be addressed by the second week of October, the latest.

 

I will continue to monitor the situation closely and will expedite the payment process as soon as the issue is resolved.

 

Please don't hesitate to reach out if you have any questions or need further clarification.

 

Best regards,

Hagop

Dear All,

 

The insurer has agreed to a settlement of AED 133,463.82, net to Traveller. The funds are expected to be released within 2-3 weeks, pending the resolution of an unrelated credit control matter, which should be addressed by the second week of October, the latest.

 

I will continue to monitor the situation closely and will expedite the payment process as soon as the issue is resolved.

 

Please don't hesitate to reach out if you have any questions or need further clarification.

 

Best regards,

Hagop

Dear All,

 

The insurer has agreed to a settlement of AED 133,463.82, net to Traveller. The funds are expected to be released within 2-3 weeks, pending the resolution of an unrelated credit control matter, which should be addressed by the second week of October, the latest.

 

I will continue to monitor the situation closely and will expedite the payment process as soon as the issue is resolved.

 

Please don't hesitate to reach out if you have any questions or need further clarification.

 

Best regards,

Hagop

Dear All,

 

The insurer has agreed to a settlement of AED 133,463.82, net to Traveller. The funds are expected to be released within 2-3 weeks, pending the resolution of an unrelated credit control matter, which should be addressed by the second week of October, the latest.

 

I will continue to monitor the situation closely and will expedite the payment process as soon as the issue is resolved.

 

Please don't hesitate to reach out if you have any questions or need further clarification.

 

Best regards,

Hagop
